com.mygdx.game.battle

Class BattleAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.battle.BattleAnimator

  • public class BattleAnimator
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the animation of agents on the battle screen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The base speed at which agents move to attack.

      The ability that is causing the agent to move.

      The agent that is currently moving.

      Whether the current turn agent is moving out to attack or returning.

      The number of pixels moved each frame in each direction.

      The number of pixels moved each frame in each direction.

      The target and original coordinates of the current move agent.

      The target and original coordinates of the current move agent.

      The target and original coordinates of the current move agent.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates the movement and checks for reaching target location. Will also call the movementDone function of the caller to notify of a movement completion.
        Parameters:
        delta - the time elapsed since the last update

      • updateMovement

        private void updateMovement()
        Moves the current move agent one step.

      • checkArrived

        private boolean checkArrived()
        Checks to see if the agent has arrived at the target coordinates.
        Returns:
        true if agent has arrived

        private float getDistance(float point1,
                          float point2)
        Returns the distance between two points.
        Parameters:
        point1 - the first point
        point2 - the second point
        Returns:
        the distance between the two points in pixels

      • moveAgentTo

        public void moveAgentTo(Agent agent,
                        float thisTargetX,
                        UseAbility caller)
        Moves the specified agent to the target coordinates.
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent to move
        thisTargetX - the target x coordinate
        caller - the ability that is calling the function

        Returns the current move agent to its starting location.
